Springle Bolasol

$2.99

Springle is a mesmerizing visual toy for iPhone, touch and iPad. Explore rich and evolving environments as they come alive with your touch.
Space out to Springle on the subway or use it to VJ your next show!

Buy product

Categories: iPad App, iPhone App. Tags: iPad, iPhone.
  • Shop
  • Reviews (0)

Product Description

Springle is very easy to use:

-Save screenshots by pressing the camera icon.

-Double click to change the color palette.

-Open the controls by pressing the little tab and chose new shapes, modes, and more!

Enjoy!

Sablo Disportium

Sablo lets you explore the nebulous boundary between order and chaos: complexity. Based on an abstract model of a pile of sand, Sablo reacts to your taps and swipes to create intricate, evolving and unique patterns. No two experiences will be the same. Prepare to be mesmerized by the far-reaching effects of a simple gesture as your actions take on a life of their own in the world of Sablo.


$0.99
